<Unit name="Knights of the Sun Griffon" 
	ReplaceHalberdWithLance="Replace Halberd with Lance"
	BannerEnchantment="Household Standard"
>Knights of the Sun Griffon, Replace Halberd with Lance, Household Standard
<Unit name="Knights of the Sun Griffon" 
	ReplaceHalberdWithLance="Replace Halberd with Lance"
	BannerEnchantment="Banner of Unity"
>Knights of the Sun Griffon, Replace Halberd with Lance, Banner of Unity
<Unit name="Knights of the Sun Griffon" 
	ReplaceHalberdWithLance="Replace Halberd with Lance"
